item.title: Report E-2024100351
item.description:
Report E-2024100351

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-16T09:16:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-23
  • City: FRIDLEY
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1511 ET, XPO-XMP notified ERTS of a cargo release. It was reported approximately 10 gallons of TRUPOWER DISHMACHINE DETERGENT ALL PURPOSE product released from 10-gallon plastic pail due to improper loading (not enough straps causing the pallet to tip over). The release impacted inside trailer#321-6238. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and approved of this being cleaned up by terminal personnel, no further assistance was needed. Product was containerized into a 10-gallon poly drum, along with paper towels, oil dri, and gloves. The waste was staged for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2024090700
item.description:
Report X-2024090700

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-15
  • City: St Paul

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNION PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 2
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Tank car was leaking from car when in motion. During switching operations employee was splashed with product. Inspection found that the vapor valve was open and the plug was not threaded to the valve.
